articles.title: Cyberattack disrupts systems at several major European airports, delaying travel - PBS
articles.description: A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems disrupted air traffic and caused delays at several of Europe’s major airports on Saturday. While the impact on travelers appeared to be limited, experts said the intrusion exposed vulnerabilities in securi…
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems disrupted air traffic and caused delays at several of Europes major airports on Saturday.
While the impact on travelers appeared to … [+4991 chars]
